member.name: P:MudBlazor.MudBaseButton.Target

member.name: P:MudBlazor.MudComponentBase.UserAttributes

member.name: P:MudBlazor.MudTableBase.Elevation
member.summary: The higher the number, the heavier the drop-shadow. 0 for no shadow.

member.name: P:MudBlazor.MudTableBase.Square
member.summary: Set true to disable rounded corners

member.name: P:MudBlazor.MudTableBase.Dense
member.summary: Set true for rows with a narrow height

member.name: P:MudBlazor.MudTableBase.Hover
member.summary: Set true to see rows hover on mouse-over.

member.name: P:MudBlazor.MudTableBase.FixedHeader
member.summary: When true, the header will stay in place when the table is scrolled. Note: set Height to make the table scrollable.

member.name: P:MudBlazor.MudTableBase.Height
member.summary: Setting a height will allow to scroll the table. If not set, it will try to grow in height. You can set this to any CSS value that the attribute 'height' accepts, i.e. 500px.

member.name: P:MudBlazor.MudTableBase.RowsPerPage
member.summary: If the table has more items than this number, it will break the rows into pages of said size. Note: requires a MudTablePager in PagerContent.

member.name: P:MudBlazor.MudTableBase.CurrentPage
member.summary: The page index of the currently displayed page. Usually called by MudTablePager. Note: requires a MudTablePager in PagerContent.

member.name: P:MudBlazor.MudTableBase.MultiSelection
member.summary: Set to true to enable selection of multiple rows with check boxes.

member.name: P:MudBlazor.MudTableBase.ToolBarContent
member.summary: Optional. Add any kind of toolbar to this render fragment.

member.name: P:MudBlazor.MudTableBase.HeaderContent
member.summary: Add MudTh cells here to define the table header.

member.name: P:MudBlazor.MudTableBase.PagerContent
member.summary: Add MudTablePager here to enable breaking the rows in to multiple pages.

member.name: P:MudBlazor.MudContainer.Fixed
member.summary: Set the max-width to match the min-width of the current breakpoint. This is useful if you'd prefer to design for a fixed set of sizes instead of trying to accommodate a fully fluid viewport. It's fluid by default.

member.name: P:MudBlazor.MudTable`1.RowTemplate
member.summary: Defines how a table row looks like. Use MudTd to define the table cells and their content.

member.name: P:MudBlazor.MudTable`1.Items
member.summary: The data to display in the table. MudTable will render one row per item

member.name: P:MudBlazor.MudTable`1.Filter
member.summary: A function that returns whether or not an item should be displayed in the table. You can use this to implement your own search function.

member.name: P:MudBlazor.MudTable`1.SelectedItem
member.summary: Returns the item which was last clicked on in single selection mode (that is, if MultiSelection is false)

member.name: P:MudBlazor.MudTable`1.SelectedItemChanged
member.summary: Callback is called when a row has been clicked and returns the selected item.

member.name: P:MudBlazor.MudTable`1.SelectedItems
member.summary: If MultiSelection is true, this returns the currently selected items. You can bind this property and the initial content of the HashSet you bind it to will cause these rows to be selected initially.

member.name: P:MudBlazor.MudTable`1.SelectedItemsChanged
member.summary: Callback is called whenever items are selected or deselected in multi selection mode.

member.name: M:MudBlazor.MudTableSortLabel`1.SetSortDirection(MudBlazor.SortDirection)
member.summary: Set sort direction but don't update Table sort order. This should only be called by Table
